plot outline: Maasi, a police officer, gets caught in the middle of a bloody rivalry between two gangsters. He also loses his wife and mother in the course. He then uses wit and strength to bring them to justice.
title: Maasi
plot: _Maasi_ (qv), a police officer, gets caught in the middle of a bloody rivalry between two gangsters. He also loses his wife and mother in the course. He then uses wit and strength to bring them to justice.
